channel.title: Windows 7
channel.description:
Hi, I need to make it so people with Windows 7 can run my client.
Here is my current client's run.bat:
[code] @echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit [/code]

item.title: Windows 7
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

[quote=“tyttty, post:2, topic:365003”]@echo off
cd “c:\program files (x86)\java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar
pause

that will do it[/quote]

Only if the client’s location is there.

@echo off title Gui "C:\Program Files (x86)\java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7
item.dc:creator: @tyttty tyttty
item.description:
@tyttty wrote:

@echo off
cd “c:\program files (x86)\java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar
pause

that will do it

item.title: Windows 7
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Hi, I need to make it so people with Windows 7 can run my client.

Here is my current client’s run.bat:

@echo off
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit
